name: SID 0x31 Routine Control - Production-Ready ECU Test Suite
description: Comprehensive production-grade test suite for UDS Service ID 0x31 (RoutineControl) based on ISO 14229-1:2020 Section 9.5. Simulates real-world automotive ECU testing scenarios including complete diagnostic workflows, service interactions, error recovery, and all NRCs (0x12, 0x13, 0x22, 0x24, 0x31, 0x33, 0x72, 0x7F). Covers 24 test categories with proper session management and Tester Present integration for long-running routines.

requests.description: [SETUP] TC-01: Reset to Default Session - Baseline for all tests
TC-01.1: Start Read ECU Info (0x0100) in DEFAULT - Expect Positive Response 71 01 01 00
TC-01.2: Request Results for ECU Info - Expect 71 03 01 00 [Results]
TC-01.3: Start System Status (0x0101) in DEFAULT - Expect Positive Response
TC-01.4: Get Results for System Status - Expect 71 03 01 01 [Status]
[SETUP] TC-02: Reset for Session Validation Tests
TC-02.1: Start Fuel Pump Test (0x0F01) in DEFAULT - Expect NRC 0x7F (Service Not Supported In Active Session)
TC-02.2: Start Injector Test (0xF012) in DEFAULT - Expect NRC 0x7F (Requires EXTENDED)
TC-02.3: Switch to EXTENDED Session
TC-02.4: Start Fuel Pump Test in EXTENDED - Expect Positive Response (No Security Required)
TC-02.5: Get Fuel Pump Results - Expect 71 03 0F 01 01 (PASS)
[SETUP] TC-03: Reset for Security Access Validation
TC-03.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-03.2: Start Injector Test (0xF012) WITHOUT Security - Expect NRC 0x33 (Security Access Denied)
TC-03.3: Start Throttle Calibration (0xABCD) WITHOUT Security - Expect NRC 0x33
TC-03.4: Request Security Seed (SID 0x27 SF 0x01)
TC-03.5: Send Correct Security Key [0xB7, 0x6E, 0xA6, 0x77] - Unlock ECU
TC-03.6: Start Injector Test WITH Security - Expect Positive Response 71 01 F0 12
TC-03.7: Get Injector Test Results - Expect 71 03 F0 12 01 (PASS)
[SETUP] TC-04: Reset for Sequence Error Detection - Start While Running
TC-04.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-04.2: Start Fuel Pump Test - Expect Positive Response
TC-04.3: START Again While Running - Expect NRC 0x24 (Request Sequence Error)
TC-04.4: STOP Running Routine - Expect Positive Response 71 02 0F 01
TC-04.5: STOP Again (Not Running) - Expect NRC 0x24 (Request Sequence Error)
[SETUP] TC-05: Reset for Sequence Error - Request Results Before Start
TC-05.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-05.2: REQUEST RESULTS Before Starting - Expect NRC 0x24 (Never Started)
TC-05.3: Now Start Horn Test (0x0F02) - Expect Positive Response
TC-05.4: Request Results After Start - Expect Positive Response with Results
[SETUP] TC-06: Reset for Invalid SubFunction Tests
TC-06.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-06.2: SubFunction 0x00 (Reserved) - Expect NRC 0x12 (SubFunction Not Supported)
TC-06.3: SubFunction 0x04 (Invalid) - Expect NRC 0x12
TC-06.4: SubFunction 0x7F (Max Valid Range) - Expect NRC 0x12
TC-06.5: SubFunction 0x80 (Suppress Positive Response bit) - Expect NRC 0x12 or Suppressed
[SETUP] TC-07: Reset for Message Length Validation
TC-07.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-07.2: No RID Bytes (Too Short) - Expect NRC 0x13 (Incorrect Message Length)
TC-07.3: Only One RID Byte - Expect NRC 0x13
TC-07.4: No SubFunction (If Possible) - Expect NRC 0x13
[SETUP] TC-08: Reset for Invalid RID Tests (Out of Range)
TC-08.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-08.2: Invalid RID 0xDEAD - Expect NRC 0x31 (Request Out Of Range)
TC-08.3: Invalid RID 0xFFFE - Expect NRC 0x31
TC-08.4: RID 0x0000 (Reserved) - Expect NRC 0x31
TC-08.5: Request Results for Invalid RID - Expect NRC 0x31
[SETUP] TC-09: Reset for PROGRAMMING Session Routines
TC-09.1: Enter PROGRAMMING Session
TC-09.2: Start Erase Flash (0xFF00) WITHOUT Security - Expect NRC 0x33
TC-09.3: Request Security Seed
TC-09.4: Unlock Security with Key [0xB7, 0x6E, 0xA6, 0x77]
TC-09.5: Start Erase Flash WITH Security - Expect Positive Response 71 01 FF 00
TC-09.6: Try to STOP Erase (Not Supported) - Expect NRC 0x12 (SubFunction Not Supported for this RID)
TC-09.7: Request Erase Results - Expect Positive Response 71 03 FF 00 00
[SETUP] TC-10: Reset for Session Change Aborts Routine Test
TC-10.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-10.2: Start Fuel Pump Test - Routine Running
TC-10.3: Change to DEFAULT Session - Should AUTO-ABORT Routine
TC-10.4: Return to EXTENDED Session
TC-10.5: Request Results for Aborted Routine - Expect NRC 0x24 (Sequence Error)
[SETUP] TC-11: Reset for Long-Running Routine with Tester Present
TC-11.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-11.2: Request Security Seed
TC-11.3: Unlock Security
TC-11.4: Start Throttle Calibration (0xABCD, 30s Long) - Expect Positive Response
TC-11.5: Tester Present (3E 00) - Keep Session Alive
TC-11.6: Check Progress - Expect Running Status (00 = In Progress)
TC-11.7: Tester Present - Continue Keep Alive
TC-11.8: STOP Long-Running Routine Early - Expect Positive Response 71 02 AB CD
TC-11.9: Get Final State After Stop - Expect Stopped Status
[SETUP] TC-12: Reset for Multi-Session Routine Support
TC-12.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-12.2: Request Security Seed
TC-12.3: Unlock Security
TC-12.4: Start ECU Self Test (0x0202) in EXTENDED - Expect Positive Response
TC-12.5: Get Results in EXTENDED - Expect 71 03 02 02 01 01 FF
TC-12.6: Switch to PROGRAMMING Session
TC-12.7: Request Security Seed in PROGRAMMING
TC-12.8: Unlock Security in PROGRAMMING
TC-12.9: Start ECU Self Test in PROGRAMMING - Expect Positive Response (Multi-Session Support)
TC-12.10: Get Results in PROGRAMMING - Expect Same Results
[SETUP] TC-13: Reset for All Actuator Tests Workflow
TC-13.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-13.2: Start Fuel Pump Relay Test (0x0F01) - No Security
TC-13.3: Get Results - Expect PASS
TC-13.4: Start Horn Test (0x0F02)
TC-13.5: Get Horn Results - Expect PASS
TC-13.6: Start Headlight Test (0x0F03)
TC-13.7: Get Headlight Results - Expect PASS
[SETUP] TC-14: Reset for Secured Actuator Tests
TC-14.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-14.2: Request Seed
TC-14.3: Unlock Security
TC-14.4: Start Injector Cyl 1 Test (0xF012)
TC-14.5: Get Injector Results - Expect PASS
TC-14.6: Start Throttle Motor Test (0xF034)
TC-14.7: Get Throttle Results - Expect PASS
[SETUP] TC-15: Reset for Sensor Tests
TC-15.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-15.2: Request Seed
TC-15.3: Unlock Security
TC-15.4: Start O2 Sensor Test (0xF156)
TC-15.5: Tester Present - 10s Execution Time
TC-15.6: Get O2 Sensor Results - Expect PASS
[SETUP] TC-16: Reset for Programming Verification Routines
TC-16.1: Enter PROGRAMMING Session
TC-16.2: Request Seed
TC-16.3: Unlock Security
TC-16.4: Start Check Programming Integrity (0xFF01)
TC-16.5: Get Integrity Results - Expect PASS with Integrity Bytes
TC-16.6: Start Verify Flash Programming (0xFF02)
TC-16.7: Tester Present - 20s Execution Time
TC-16.8: Get Verification Results - Expect PASS
[SETUP] TC-17: Reset for Complete Diagnostic Workflow Test
TC-17.1: Phase 1 - Setup Extended Session
TC-17.2: Phase 2 - Security Unlock (Request Seed)
TC-17.3: Phase 2 - Security Unlock (Send Key)
TC-17.4: Phase 3 - Read VIN (0xF190) Pre-Check
TC-17.5: Phase 4 - Execute Fuel Pump Test
TC-17.6: Phase 4 - Tester Present During Test
TC-17.7: Phase 5 - Get Test Results
TC-17.8: Phase 6 - Read DTCs After Test (0x19 02 0F)
TC-17.9: Phase 6 - Clear Test DTCs (0x14 FF FF FF)
TC-17.10: Phase 7 - Return to Default Session
[SETUP] TC-18: Reset for NRC Priority Order Validation
TC-18.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-18.2: Injector Test Without Security - Should return NRC 0x33 (Security priority)
TC-18.3: Invalid SF + Valid RID - Should return NRC 0x12 (SF priority over Security)
TC-18.4: Valid SF + Missing RID - Should return NRC 0x13 (Length priority)
[SETUP] TC-19: Reset for STOP Subfunction Edge Cases
TC-19.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-19.2: STOP Basic Routine That Was Never Started - Expect NRC 0x24
TC-19.3: Start Fuel Pump Test
TC-19.4: STOP Different Routine (0x0F02) - Expect NRC 0x24 or Success if tracking per RID
TC-19.5: STOP Correct Running Routine (0x0F01) - Expect Success
[SETUP] TC-20: Reset for Multiple RIDs in Same Category
TC-20.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-20.2: Start Fuel Pump (0x0F01)
TC-20.3: Start Horn (0x0F02) While Fuel Pump Running - Tests Concurrent Routine Handling
TC-20.4: Get Fuel Pump Results
TC-20.5: Get Horn Results
[SETUP] TC-21: Reset for Boundary RID Values
TC-21.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-21.2: RID 0x0001 (Low Boundary) - Expect NRC 0x31 if not supported
TC-21.3: RID 0xFFFF (Max Boundary) - Expect NRC 0x31
TC-21.4: Valid Low RID 0x0100 - Expect Positive (Read ECU Info)
TC-21.5: Valid RID 0x0101 - Expect Positive (System Status)
[SETUP] TC-22: Reset for Session-Specific RID Availability
TC-22.1: Erase Flash (0xFF00) in DEFAULT - Expect NRC 0x7F (Programming Only)
TC-22.2: Switch to EXTENDED
TC-22.3: Erase Flash in EXTENDED - Expect NRC 0x7F (Programming Only)
TC-22.4: Switch to PROGRAMMING
TC-22.5: Request Seed for Security
TC-22.6: Unlock Security
TC-22.7: Erase Flash in PROGRAMMING + Security - Expect Success
TC-22.8: Verify Erase Results
[SETUP] TC-23: Reset for Suppress Positive Response Bit
TC-23.1: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-23.2: Start with SPR Bit (0x81) - May Suppress Response or Return NRC 0x12
TC-23.3: Request Results with SPR Bit (0x83)
[SETUP] TC-24: Reset for Full Programming Sequence Simulation
TC-24.1: Enter Programming Session
TC-24.2: Security Request Seed
TC-24.3: Security Send Key
TC-24.4: Check Programming Integrity (Pre-Conditions)
TC-24.5: Verify Pre-Conditions Results
TC-24.6: Erase Flash Memory
TC-24.7: Tester Present During Erase
TC-24.8: Verify Erase Complete
TC-24.9: Verify Flash Programming
TC-24.10: Tester Present During Verification
TC-24.11: Get Verification Results
TC-24.12: Return to Default Session - Complete Programming Sequence
[FINAL] Reset to Default Session - Test Suite Complete

metadata.author: UDS Simulator - Production Grade
metadata.description: ISO 14229-1:2020 Section 9.5 compliant production-grade test suite for SID 0x31 (RoutineControl). Simulates real-world automotive ECU testing with comprehensive service interaction patterns, error recovery mechanisms, and complete diagnostic workflows.

testCategories.TC-03: Security Access Validation - Security Required Routines
testCategories.TC-04: Sequence Error - START While Running / STOP While Idle
testCategories.TC-08: Invalid RID Tests - Out of Range
testCategories.TC-11: Long-Running Routine with Tester Present Integration
testCategories.TC-17: Complete Diagnostic Workflow (Session → Security → Test → DTC → Clear)

positiveResponseConditions.summary: Conditions required for a positive response (0x71)
conditions: Message length >= 4 bytes (SID + SF + RID_HI + RID_LO)
Routine ID (RID) is supported by the ECU
Current session matches routine's required session
Security unlocked if routine requires security access
Proper sequence: START before STOP/RESULTS; STOP only if running
Vehicle conditions met (speed, engine state, voltage, temperature)
Routine executes successfully without hardware/software errors

0x12.name: SubFunction Not Supported
causes: SubFunction not supported for specific RID

0x7F.name: Service Not Supported In Active Session

serviceInteractions.SID_0x10: Session Control - Required for session transitions, routine availability
serviceInteractions.SID_0x27: Security Access - Required for protected routine execution
serviceInteractions.SID_0x3E: Tester Present - Keep session alive during long-running routines (2-3s interval)
serviceInteractions.SID_0x19: Read DTC Information - Check for errors after routine execution
serviceInteractions.SID_0x14: Clear DTC - Clear test-generated DTCs after routine completion
serviceInteractions.SID_0x22: Read Data By ID - Pre/post verification (e.g., read VIN, check status)

errorRecovery.sessionTimeout: Send Tester Present (0x3E) every 2-3 seconds during long routines
errorRecovery.wrongSession: Transition to correct session using 0x10 before retry
errorRecovery.securityDenied: Perform security access sequence (0x27 01/02) before retry
errorRecovery.conditionsNotMet: Check vehicle state, fix conditions, clear DTCs with 0x14, retry routine
errorRecovery.routineFailure: Read DTCs with 0x19, diagnose issue, fix hardware, clear DTCs, retry
errorRecovery.sequenceError: Reset routine state with session change (0x10 01) then proper sequence

notes: Production-Grade Test Suite v2.0.0: Comprehensive 24-category test coverage for SID 0x31 (RoutineControl). Based on analysis of ISO 14229-1:2020 and three comprehensive documentation files covering practical implementation, routine control specifications, and service interactions. Covers: (1) Basic/advanced routine execution, (2) All 8 NRCs with priority order, (3) Complete service interaction workflows, (4) Tester Present integration for long-running routines, (5) Session change routine abort behavior, (6) Multi-session routine support, (7) Programming sequence simulation, (8) Boundary value testing, (9) Suppress positive response handling, (10) Error recovery patterns. Suitable for real-world automotive ECU validation testing.
